Tool

NameGPX to shapefile

Author

Description

Converts a GPX file into a Shapefile (.shp)(c) 2005 by Victor Olaya email: volaya@ya.com

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Options

GPX fileFile pathFILE
